derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French gramarien, from gramaire (see grammar)

entry.def: A grammarian is someone who studies the grammar of a language and writes books about it or teaches it.

means.word_mean: 1. a linguist who specializes in the study of grammar and syntax
